mapper.insert: insert into ZT_COMPANY (ID, CODE, NAME, AREA, INDUSTRY, CN_SPELL, MARKET, LIST_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, DATA_VERSION) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{market,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ZT_COMPANY set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_SPELL = #{cnSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET = #{market,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIST_DATE = #{listDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DATA_VERSION = #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DATA_VERSION = #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1
mapper.select: select ID, CODE, NAME, AREA, INDUSTRY, CN_SPELL, MARKET, LIST_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, DATA_VERSION from ZT_COMPANY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
